application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details of the noise impact assessment in pursuant to condition 5 of planning application Ref: 216082FUL dated 05.05.2022 are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition.  The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D6 & D14 of the London Plan (2021), Ealing SPG10 and the National
description: Details of sound insulation pursuant to condition 5 of planning permission ref: 216082FUL dated 05.05.2022 "Construction of a sixth floor to accommodate two additional self-contained residential units to previously approved scheme ref: 183569FUL granted on appeal Ref: APP/A5270/W/19/3227828 dated 23/03/ 2020 for: 'Construction of a part five-storey and part six-storey building comprising 19 flats, 17 x one bedroom, 1 x two bedroom and 1 x studio; A1 shop unit on ground floor'"
